text.text: Can you provide an overview of when and where patient information can be changed in ZOLL Billing?

text: Patient demographics can be changed on the Claim page by clicking the edit icon next to the patient's name. This will take you to the patient's account page. You can also change patient information on the Signature, attachments & patient details page. When you click Next, ZOLL Billing sends a patient demographic request to the consumer credit reporting agencies. The results of the query will display under Patient details.

text.text: Are there any restrictions or limitations on what patient information can be changed?

text: Patient information can be changed during claim creation, and on the Claim and Account page.

text.text: How does ZOLL Billing ensure the accuracy and integrity of patient data when changes are made?

text: ZOLL Billing tries to minimize duplicates by constantly comparing the name, SSN, address, and date of birth of existing records with the information being entered/imported. If a possible duplicate exists, the system presents the patient data and asks you to choose the correct information.

text.text: Can users track or view a history of changes made to patient information in ZOLL Billing?

text: Yes, users can track or view a history of changes made to patient information in ZOLL Billing.

text.text: Does ZOLL Billing provide any validation checks or prompts to verify the accuracy of changes made to patient information?

text: Yes, ZOLL Billing provides validation checks and prompts to verify the accuracy of changes made to patient information. For example, if ZOLL Billing is not confident that the returned information is valid for the patient, a warning banner displays at the top of the section that shows the confidence score.

text.text: Are there any automated notifications or alerts triggered when patient information is changed?

text: The system runs demographic data every 30 days unless information changes. If information changes, or if 30 days expire, the "Refresh patient demographics" enables.

text.text: How does ZOLL Billing handle changes to patient information in terms of data privacy and security?

text: ZOLL Billing sends a patient demographic request to the consumer credit reporting agencies. The results of the query displays under "Patient details".

text.text: Claim creation and on the Claim page

text: Patient information can be changed during claim creation, and on the Claim and Account page. To change patient information, click the edit icon next to the patient name.

text: Patient information can be changed during claim creation, and on the Claim and Account page. To change patient information, click the edit icon next to the patient name.
